surfaces

Class FVPolygonMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • surfaces.Surface3D
      • surfaces.PolygonMesh
        • surfaces.FVPolygonMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableSurface, Labelizable

    public class FVPolygonMesh
extends PolygonMesh
    Face-Vertex polygon Mesh which extends the abstract PolygonMesh class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FVPolygonMesh()
      Creates a new empty Face-Vertex Polygon Mesh.
      FVPolygonMesh(java.util.ArrayList<Point3D> vertices, java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D> faces, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D>> verticesToFaces)
      Creates a new Face-Vertex Polygon Mesh with the given information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add2Vertices(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, java.lang.String instruct, double w)
      Adds two new points to the Mesh.
      void add3Vertices(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Point3D p3, java.lang.String instruct, double w)
      Adds three new points to the Mesh which directly form a new Triangle.
      void addVertex(Point3D p, java.lang.String instruct)
      Adds a new point to the polygon Mesh.
      double surfaceArea()
      Calculates the surface area for every face and returns the sum of these surfaces.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a string containing all information of the Face-Vertex polygon Mesh.
      java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D> triangulate()
      Returns an arraylist containing the faces of the current Face-Vertex polygon Mesh.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D>> vertsToFaces()
      Returns an arraylist containing the arraylist which states which faces are connected to what vertices.
      double volume()
      Calculates the volume of the Face-Vertex polygon Mesh.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FVPolygonMesh

        public FVPolygonMesh(java.util.ArrayList<Point3D> vertices,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D> faces,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Triangle3D>> verticesToFaces)
        Creates a new Face-Vertex Polygon Mesh with the given information.
        Parameters:
        vertices - An arraylist containing the vertices of the FVPolygonMesh.
        faces - An arraylist containing the faces (Triangle3D) of the FVPolygonMesh.
        verticesToFaces - An arraylist containing arraylists, where each arraylist states which faces are connected to which vertex of the FVPolygonMesh.

      • FVPolygonMesh

        public FVPolygonMesh()
        Creates a new empty Face-Vertex Polygon Mesh.
